mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_promotion (`name`, description, `level`, `enable`, start_time, end_time, end_point, `rule`, coupon_type, events, page_url) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endPoint,jdbcType=BIT}, #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{events,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_promotion set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `enable` = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_point = #{endPoint,jdbcType=BIT}, `rule` = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_type = #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, events = #{events,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_url = #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, description, `level`, `enable`, start_time, end_time, end_point, `rule`, coupon_type, events, page_url from t_promotion where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, `name`, description, `level`, `enable`, start_time, end_time, end_point, `rule`, coupon_type, events, page_url from t_promotion
